featured.text: Before a match is made, potential swappers tend to discuss a lot.
Swappers are supposed to make sure their home is in order before they depart, but one person’s idea of “clean” may be more forgiving than another’s.
Exchange sites recommend that swappers discuss such matters ahead of time.
As one swapper puts it, “Nobody is going to fly across the ocean or drive 600 miles to come steal your TV.

definition.en_def: A person or thing that exchanges or swaps items.
definition.example: The swapper brought several books to trade at the event.
